ygData.subject: Re: Diamond Dust.....
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I think he s just blowing smoke. Tell him that if he gets you the dust, you ll make him the item. If he hems and haws about it, or can t produce it, then
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, Jan 04, 2000 at 05:20:22PM -0000, cerceta@... wrote:
> From: cerceta@...
>
> OK don't get to excited but I have been asked by a fellow gnome to make
> the gemcutter. He claims he can get the diamond dust for me, but won't
> give up the npc that drops it. He claims that the npc is 50th level and
> that the diamond dust is a rare drop item off it. I am thinking that this
> could mean that the npc may be in the planes but that is merley speculation.
> I wish he would give up the info but he is keeping it hidden from all for
> another gnome. Well i hope this gives all you tinkerers hope:)

I think he's just blowing smoke.

Tell him that if he gets you the dust, you'll make him the item.

If he hems and haws about it, or can't produce it, then you'll have your
answer.

Joe D
